content: from the center and pin gently to the mat pulling gently on your lace to stretch it out just slightly pin opposite sides as you go around so make sure your shaping is even lastly pin each of the points pulling gently to shape and pinning opposite sides as you go around making sure to stay equidistant to your concentric circles take a step back and correct any misshaped sides as needed using a hot steam iron gently steam your project do not let the iron actually touch the project you want to make sure the steam gets the project nice and damp gently spray with a can of heavy starch lean blocking mat against wall point a fan at it to accelerate drying written pattern chain 8 and join with a slip_stitch to form a circle round 1 = ch1 16 single_crochet in the circle join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 2 = csdc ch1 double_crochet in next stitch ch1 around join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 3 = ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in next space single_crochet in next stitch picot single_crochet in next space single_crochet in next stitch twice picot seven times single_crochet in next space join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 4 = slip_stitch into next stich csdc ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next stitch ch7 skip next picot and next two stitches double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next stitch seven times ch7 join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 5 = ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in next space single_crochet in next stitch twice 3sc ch2 3sc in ch7 space single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next space twice single_crochet in next stitch seven times 3sc ch2 3sc over next space join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 6 = ch1 decrease single_crochet in next stitch decrease single_crochet in each of the next three stitches single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in ch2 space single_crochet in each of the next three stitches eight times join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch *the decrease stitch in round 7 combines the two sc2togs from the previous round* round 7 = csdc skip one stitch double_crochet in next stitch ch1 skip one stitch double_crochet in next stitch twice ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in ch2 space ch1 double_crochet in next stitch skip one stich twice ch1 decrease ch1 skip one stitch double_crochet in next stitch twice ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in ch2 space ch1 double_crochet in next stitch skip one stich twice ch1 around join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 8 = ch1 single_crochet in stitch single_crochet in space four times single_crochet ch3 single_crochet in next stitch single_crochet in next space single_crochet in stitch single_crochet in space three times around join with a slip_stitch to beginning stitch round 9 = slip_stitch all the way up and into the ch3 space ch1 single_crochet in same space ch20 single_crochet in next ch3 space ch20 around join with
